channel.title: Algorithmic Collusion on Aldric Labarthe
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithmic Collusion on Aldric Labarthe

item.title: Strategies and equilibria on selected markets: a multi-agent simulation and stochastic modeling approach
item.description: In this paper, we introduce the first agent-based model of competition in quantities featuring a *Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient* (DDPG) algorithm and assess its effect on both equilibrium stability and collusive outcome.
